events.message: I just received my order but the product is broken; there is a large crack on the screen and it does not work properly.
The reported issue has been categorized as a product defect due to damage and malfunction.
A customer support agent has been assigned to review the broken product claim and assist the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. I’m here to help you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged product and the packaging it came in? This will help us process your claim faster.
I have attached several photos showing the large crack on the screen and some scratches on the casing as proof of the damage.
Thank you for the photos. We will send you a replacement immediately or process a refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option you would like.
I appreciate your quick response. I would prefer to receive a replacement as soon as possible, thank you.
We have arranged a replacement for you and it will be shipped within 24 hours. You will receive a tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement product has arrived and to make sure everything is working perfectly now.
The replacement arrived yesterday and it works perfectly. Thank you for your help and prompt service!
Since the issue has been resolved to your satisfaction, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support service. Your feedback is very important to us.
